function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Possibility of airborne transmission of tb disease","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nonsignificant trend for uv lights to be more protective than ionizers against tb infection and disease","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in tb infections and disease due to ionizers and uv lights","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tb in a clinical setting.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate positioning or installation of uv fixtures leading to occupant over-exposure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of safety measures leading to adverse uv effects on patients and staff","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate uv intensity due to lack of maintenance and degradation of uv bulbs.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear guidelines for upper-room uv installation and maintenance, leading to ineffective use.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on expensive uv fixtures and bulbs, limiting accessibility in resource-limited settings.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective air mixing in patient rooms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse effect of increasing relative humidity on uv germicidal efficacy","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher ion densities achieved in poultry studies may not be applicable to healthcare environments, reducing the effectiveness of ionizers in preventing tb transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulation of potentially infectious particles onto adjacent surfaces or grounded parts of the ionizer, leading to localized outbreak of tb-infected animals and potential risk of transmission to humans.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Static charge interference with medical equipment due to ionizers, potentially leading to malfunctions or hazards in medical equipment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning and handling of the ionizers leading to potential contamination","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential differences in ionizer effect on tb transmission between ward and animal facility","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tb infection spreading in overcrowded settings","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of studies in clinical settings for environmental control measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with ppd conversion and tb infection in animals","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in indoor settings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of respiratory isolation facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious spread of mycobacterium tuberculosis through airborne droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dormant tuberculosis bacteria causing disease years after initial infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of drug-resistant m. tuberculosis strains","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resurgence of tuberculosis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission in healthcare settings and resource-limited settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of infectious particles in the air","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air circulation in the humans.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information dissemination on tuberculosis prevention and control measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control in healthcare settings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to integrated hiv and tuberculosis information","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aumento significativo da curva epidemiológica devido à pandemia da covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concentração das iniciativas de adoção de tecnologia em locais historicamente favoráveis à inovação","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adoção de tecnologia digital na otimização dos serviçose segue uma tendência mundial","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adopción de tecnología digital en el 83% de las ciudades encuestadas","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate management of urban mobility and connections between individuals, leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consolidate public policies and administrative actions during periods of declining disease curve, leading to complacency and inadequate preparedness for future outbreaks.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of technology may not have followed or preceded the predicted growth of the infection curve, impacting the effectiveness of response to the pandemic situation.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of technology may have been a response after the rise of the infection curves in the cities, leading to a speed of response driven by the immediacy-led demands of the faced situation.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of digital tools by public management may have challenges in implementation and adaptation of activities, particularly in the context of isolation measures.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing big data and technology may lead to privacy and data security risks, especially in the context of a pandemic.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying heavily on digital solutions may exacerbate the digital divide and marginalize vulnerable populations who lack access to technology.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of digitized information for pandemic response","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones for mobility and surveillance actions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density in urban areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital tooling for data collection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data collection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Under-notification of cases may lead to distorted results","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low technology adoption in certain regions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
